commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Say, I've actually got someone in mind.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Wait, you mean someone who'll join the club, Ayumu?

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Yeah, I think you'll know when I say her name: Ai Miyashita.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Oh!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Who's that?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: The second-year girl that stands out the most. And not in a bad way, either. She's really cheerful and gets along with everyone.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: When I think about it, everyone around her seems to enjoy being there, so I'd really love to see her as a school idol!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Well, how about instead of going for Emma and Kanata, we go to recruit Ai today?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Yeah, it's best to act fast on these things. Are we all in agreement?

commands.speaker: Everyone
commands.line: Yeah!

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Huh? Me, a school idol?!

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Ahahaha, no way, no way. I'm just not that type!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: A-Are you sure?

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Sorry. I've decided not to tie myself down in any one club.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: But, why?

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Well... Because I want to experience a bunch of stuff, I guess? Like, I just wanna have a lot of fun.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: And when I think about what I want to do next, I realize I just don't have enough time to do it all.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: So...

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Then you should definitely be a school idol! School idols make things a ton of fun for everyone watching them!

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: R-Really? You're pushing pretty hard.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Experience it once and you can't stop, even if you want to.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: H-Hmm...

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Yeah! Just try and think of the scene you'll see from the stage!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: And I just know you can draw everyone into keeping up with your pace. It'll be just like what you're always doing during break times!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Being a school idol will definitely give you experiences you haven't had before. Great experiences, even. It'll show you a whole new world.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: It won't all be sunshine and roses, and there'll be some challenges, but...isn't the fun waiting for you after overcoming all that really special?

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Ai, we're actually total newcomers to being school idols, but it's really amazing!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Yeah! Everyone's got their own charm, and they're all so exciting to watch!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I couldn't hold back my excitement, and that's why I'm here asking you to join us. Isn't that power to move people amazing?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: And really, I want to see you become a school idol, Ai. I'm sure you'll be one like no other! I can just imagine it.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Ahh, all right, all right, you've got me. If you believe in this so much, then I'll believe in it too. I can't guarantee how long I'll stick around, though, all right?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Well, if it's not for you, it's not for you. I definitely think you'll love being a school idol, though.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Right, right. You're really good at getting me to do things, you know that? So, when're we startin' this thing?

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Well... About that. Um. The club is actually on death's door at the moment.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: If we don't get ten members to join, it's going to be disbanded.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Seriously?!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Uh, sorry that we kind of tricked you. But we're definitely going to get ten people and keep the club alive!

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Let's DO this!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Huh?

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: I'm not the type to ever run away from a challenge.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: I won't be bowled over! I'll just be bold!

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Oh, bowled like bowling and bold like brave.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Pff... Ahaha! Ai, that was great!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: G-Great? That kind of made me raise an eyebrow.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Shh... Kasumi, she's always had baby-level jokes, but that's a really cute part of her.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Eheheh, I'm glad you get my jokes! Anyway, "Ai"'ll introduce you to someone you'll really want to invite to the club!

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: She's this first year named Rina Tennoji. Hang on a sec, I'll go call her!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: M-Me? A school idol?

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Yeah! Rinari, you're super unique, and I think that's really great! Let's do this together, Rinari! Let's be idol sisters!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: W-Well... I want to try it with you, but...don't think I could pull it off.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Don't you think you'd be really cute if you took off this, uh, mask?

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Hands off. I can barely communicate without it.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Rinari and me made this Rina-chan Board ourselves! Rinari's real shy, but this board lets you know how she's feeling really easy, y'know?

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: A school idol with a mask? That sounds really unique, I think.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: How can we change the board's expressions quickly, though?

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Wait, guys, you're talking like she's already agreed to join!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Ai's right, Rina, you're really unique! That Rina-chan Board's going to be your biggest weapon!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: You can use it to share your emotions with the world, and... Oh, I can just see it now!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Hearing you say that... Now I think this'll really work out, too!

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Well, you heard 'em. Let's give it our all, Rinari!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: S-Sure! Rina-chan Board says "Woo-hoo!"

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Rina, we're both first years, so you can call me Kasumin. And I'll call you Rinako!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Rinako?

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: She calls me Shizuko, so we match.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: We...match? I like that. Call me Rinako.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: So you're...Kasuko, then?

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Stoooop! D-Don't call me Kasu!
